channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipment maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 22, 01:00 - 04:00 UTC

Feb 8, 00:41 UTC
Update - New start time : 22/02/2024 01:00 UTC
New end time : 22/02/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : None

Jan 31, 21:57 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/02/2024 01:00 UTC
End time : 08/02/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Zerto Upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 19, 08:00 UTC  -  Feb 20, 20:00 UTC

Feb 14, 03:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 19/02/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 20/02/2024 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Synchronisation between primary and secondary sites will be broken during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on zerto.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Veeam] - Veeam backup maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 19, 07:00 UTC  -  Feb 23, 17:00 UTC

Feb 14, 03:06 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam offer.

Start time : 19/02/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 23/02/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restore will not be available during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an internal maintenance on veeam backup service.
Customers will be notified to register their veeam servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 19, 07:00 UTC  -  Feb 23, 17:00 UTC

Feb 14, 01:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 19/02/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 23/02/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R807L25/R807L26
item.description:
Jan 25, 10:25 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/01/2024 07:17 UTC
End Time : 25/01/2024 08:30 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 25, 09:02 UTC
Update - Update : Hosts in rack R807L26 are currently reachable.

Jan 25, 08:15 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 25, 08:13 UTC
Investigating - Start Time : 25/01/2024 07:17 UTC
User impact : Hosts in racks R807L25 - R807L26 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX2A/RBX2B][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network perturbation
item.description:
Jan 22, 10:28 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/01/2024 00:00 UTC
End Time : 19/01/2024 16:30 UTC
Root cause : Software network equipment problem
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 19, 18:27 UTC
Monitoring - Our teams observed traffic loss twice for 10 minutes each during the maintenance.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Jan 19, 15:46 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams realized that network perturbations are still present. They need to implement another maintenance to solve definitively the issue: Maintenance link

Jan 19, 14:04 UTC
Monitoring - Our technical teams implemented a fix to solve the issue. Network perturbation isn't observed since 13:25 UTC.
Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 19, 09:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 16/01/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : high latency/loss for some traffic going through the gateway
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue with the manufacturer. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
